About my so-called life

Hi guys,
I’m Quynh Anh. A 22-year-old human who is bad at life. A fourth-year student of a university who is utterly lost in the woods.
Currently, I am trying to adapt into my twentyhood and embarking on a journey to find my sense of purpose on this earth.

Why I made this place

There comes a point in my life that I don't know what to do. I guess it is called "Existential Crisis". Every day I wake up, ask myself "Is it really worth it?", and still keep functioning like a normal human. Badum badum, I realize that I have been drowning in a chaos vortex of self-doubt and laziness.
Therefore, I decided to make a website to promote myself sleazy to get a job. Here comes the site!
I am really sorry if all these words sound awfully narcissistic. I am just bad at self-promotion, I swear.
The following quote is my life motto. You may ask why I put this here? Just to remind myself that I might not accomplish great things, but I still can try my best to find meaning in life.

I guess the sad truth is, not everyone will accomplish something great. Some of us may just have to find meaning in the little moments that make up life.

Things I can do for you

If you need a professional adult who is effing cool at life, you come to the wrong place. Sorry
But if you need an inexperienced kiddo who is willing to try anything once, I think I am the right person.
I am passionate about tech stuff, writing, reading and breathing.
You can check out my portfolio.
